mapper.sql: id, hall_id, guild_id, uid, create_time, update_time, is_del, member_type
mapper.select:
select
distinct
'true' as QUERYID,
from guild_hall_member
order by ${orderByClause}
mapper.insert:
insert into guild_hall_member
id,
hall_id,
guild_id,
uid,
create_time,
update_time,
is_del,
member_type,
#{id,jdbcType=BIGINT},
#{hallId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
#{guildId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
#{uid,jdbcType=BIGINT},
#{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
#{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
#{isDel,jdbcType=BIT},
#{memberType,jdbcType=INTEGER},
mapper.update:
update guild_hall_member
id = #{record.id,jdbcType=BIGINT},
hall_id = #{record.hallId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
guild_id = #{record.guildId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
uid = #{record.uid,jdbcType=BIGINT},
create_time = #{record.createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
update_time = #{record.updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
is_del = #{record.isDel,jdbcType=BIT},
member_type = #{record.memberType,jdbcType=INTEGER},

update guild_hall_member set id = #{record.id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, hall_id = #{record.hallId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, guild_id = #{record.guildId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, uid = #{record.uid,jdbcType=BIGINT}, create_time = #{record.createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, update_time = #{record.updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, is_del = #{record.isDel,jdbcType=BIT}, member_type = #{record.memberType,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update guild_hall_member
hall_id = #{hallId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
guild_id = #{guildId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
uid = #{uid,jdbcType=BIGINT},
create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
is_del = #{isDel,jdbcType=BIT},
member_type = #{memberType,jdbcType=INTEGER},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update guild_hall_member set hall_id = #{hallId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, guild_id = #{guildId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, uid = #{uid,jdbcType=BIGINT}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, is_del = #{isDel,jdbcType=BIT}, member_type = #{memberType,jdbcType=INTEGER} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
update guild_hall_member set is_del =1 where guild_id = #{guildId} and is_del=0
update guild_hall_member set is_del =1 where hall_id = #{hallId} and is_del=0
update guild_hall_member set is_del =1 where id = #{id} and is_del=0
mapper.select: select m.id as id, m.hall_id as hallId, m.guild_id as guildId, m.uid as uid, m.create_time as createTime, m.update_time as updateTime, m.is_del as isDel, m.member_type as memberType,r.title as roomName,u.gender as gender,u.nick as nick,u.erban_no as erbanNo from guild_hall_member m left join guild_hall h on m.hall_id=h.id and m.guild_id=h.guild_id and h.is_del=0 left join guild g on g.id=h.guild_id and g.is_del=0 left join room r on h.room_id=r.room_id left join users u on m.uid=u.uid where m.guild_id = #{guildId} and m.is_del=0 and m.uid!=g.president_uid and m.uid!=r.uid order by m.create_time desc

select m.id as id, m.hall_id as hallId, m.guild_id as guildId, m.uid as uid, m.create_time as createTime, m.update_time as updateTime, m.is_del as isDel, m.member_type as memberType,r.title as roomName,u.gender as gender,u.nick as nick,u.erban_no as erbanNo from guild_hall_member m left join guild_hall h on m.hall_id=h.id and m.guild_id=h.guild_id and h.is_del=0 left join guild g on g.id=h.guild_id and g.is_del=0 left join room r on h.room_id=r.room_id left join users u on m.uid=u.uid where m.guild_id = #{guildId} and m.hall_id = #{hallId} and m.is_del=0 and m.uid!=g.president_uid and m.uid!=r.uid order by m.create_time desc
